CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.4.k.5.2, drugstructuredosageunit (3N)
E2B (R3): G.k.4.r.1b Dose (unit) Conformance: Optional, but required if G.k.4.r.1a is populated. Data Type: 50AN OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.989.2.1.1.25 Value Allowed: Constrained UCUM codes: {DF}
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Example: 5 mg 2 times a day every other day for 30 days Dose (number): 5 Dose (unit): mg Interval: 2 Interval Unit: day Cumulative Dose to First Reaction (number): 150 Cumulative Dose to First Reaction (unit): mg
CustomField.label: Dose (Units)
